column4: I apologize if this question has been asked ad nauseum already... but the forum posts I'm finding are quite old. I'm trying to update, and dpkg is telling me that linux-libc-dev cannot be authenticated. I chose not to update, when I saw that. Has this package been compromised?
no it usually means that you have some unauthenticated repo in your sources.list
you should get rid of all externel repos before updating
I've removed all external repos. Same error.
